name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: [SOUND] This

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: lecture is a brief introduction to the course.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _We're going to cover the objectives of the course

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _course formats
column6: reference books and how to complete the course. _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: The objectives of the course are the following.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _First
column6: we would like to cover the basic context and _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: practical techniques of text data mining.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _So this means we will not be able to cover some advanced techniques in detail

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: but whether we choose the practical use for

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: techniques and then treat them in order.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: We're going to also cover the basic concepts that are very useful for

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: many applications.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: The second objective is to cover more general techniques for

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _text or data mining
column6: so we emphasize the coverage of general _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: techniques that can be applicable to any text in any natural language.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: We also hope that these techniques to either

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: automatically work on problems without any human effort or

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: only requiring minimum human effort.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: So these criteria have helped others to choose

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: techniques that can be applied to many applications.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _This is in contrast to some more detailed analysis of text data

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: particularly using natural language processing techniques.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: Now such techniques are also very important.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _And they are indeed
column6: necessary for some of the applications

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _where we would like to go in-depth to understand text

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _Such detail in understanding techniques

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: are generally not scalable and they tend to require a lot of human effort.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: So they cannot be easy to apply to any domain.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _So as you can imagine in practice

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: it would be beneficial to combine both kinds of techniques using

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: the general techniques that we'll be covering in this course as a basis and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: improve these techniques by using more human effort whenever it's appropriate.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: We also would like to provide a hands-on experience to you in multiple aspects.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _First
column6: you'll do some experiments using a text mining toolkit and _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: implementing text mining algorithms.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _Second
column6: you will have opportunity to experiment with some algorithms for _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: text mining and analytics to try them on some datasets and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: to understand how to do experiments.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _And finally
column6: you have opportunity to participate in a competition _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: of text-based prediction task.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: You're expected to know the basic concepts of computer science.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _For example

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: some other really basic concepts in computer science.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: You are also expected to be familiar with programming and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _comfortable with programming

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _This course

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _So you are not expected to do a lot of coding

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: we're going to give you C++ toolkit that's fairly sophisticated.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: So you have to be comfortable with handling such a toolkit and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: you may be asked to write a small amount of code.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: It's also useful if you know some concepts and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _techniques in probability and statistics

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: Knowing such knowledge would help you understand some of the algorithm in

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: more depth.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: The format of the course is lectures plus quizzes that will be given to you

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: in the regular basis and there is also optional programming assignment.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _Now

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _Not because it's not important

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: because we suspect that the not all of you will have the need for

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: computing resources to do the program assignment.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _So naturally
column6: we would encourage all of you to try to do _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _the program assignments
column6: if possible as that will be a great way _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: to learn about the knowledge that we teach in this course.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _There's no required reading for this course

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: but I was list some of the useful reference books here.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: So we expect you to be able to understand all the essential materials by just

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: watching the actual videos and you should be able to answer all the quiz

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: questions by just watching the videos.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _But it's always good to read additional books in the larger scope of knowledge

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: so here is this the four books.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: The first is a textbook about statistical language processing.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: Some of the chapters [INAUDIBLE] are especially relevant to this course.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _The second one is a textbook about information retrieval

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: but it has broadly covered a number of techniques that

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: are really in the category of text mining techniques.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _So it's also useful

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: The third book is actually a collection of silly articles and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: it has broadly covered all the aspects of mining text data.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: The mostly relevant chapters are also listed here.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _In these chapters
column6: you can find some in depth discussion of cutting _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: edge research on the topics that we discussed in this course.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: And the last one is actually a book that Sean Massung and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: I are currently writing and we're going to make the rough

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: draft chapters available at this URL listed right here.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: You can also find additional reference books and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: other readings at the URL listed at the bottom.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _So finally

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: to complete the course this information is also on the web.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: So I just briefly go over it and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: you can complete the course by earning one of the following badges.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: One is Course Achievement Badge.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _To earn that
column6: you have to have at least a 70% _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: average score on all the quizzes combined.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: It does mean every quiz has to be 70% or better.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _The second batch here
column6: this is a Course Mastery Badge and _

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _this just requires a higher score

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: There are also three optional programming badges.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _I said earlier that we encourage you to do programming assignments

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _they're not necessary

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: The first is Programming Achievement Badge.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: This is similar to the call switching from the badge.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: Here would require you to get at least 70% average score on programming assignments.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _And similarly

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: is given to those who can score

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: 90% average score or better.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: The last badge is a Text Mining Competition Leader Badge and

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: this is given to those of you who do well in the competition task.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: _And specifically

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: the badge to the top 30% in the leaderboard.

name: 1 - 2 - Course Prerequisites & Completion (00-09-02).srt
text: [MUSIC]
